pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Phoenix Pediatric Sepsis and Septic Shock Criteria // Implementation of the Phoenix and Phoenix-8 Sepsis Criteria as described in "Development and Validation of the Phoenix Criteria for Pediatric Sepsis and Septic Shock" by Sanchez- Pinto, Bennett, DeWitt, Russell et al. (2024) doi:10.1001/jama.2024.0196 (Drs. Sanchez-Pinto and Bennett contributed equally to this manuscript; Dr. DeWitt and Mr. Russell contributed equally to the manuscript), "International Consensus Criteria for Pediatric Sepsis and Septic Shock" by Schlapbach, Watson, Sorce, Argent, et al. (2024) doi:10.1001/jama.2024.0179 (Drs Schlapbach, Watson, Sorce, and Argent contributed equally) and the application note "phoenix: an R package and Python module for calculating the Phoenix pediatric sepsis score and criteria" by DeWitt, Russell, Rebull, Sanchez-Pinto, and Bennett (2024) doi:10.1093/jamiaopen/ooae066.
